title: Data Center Power Distribution
description: High-efficiency power distribution solution for modern data center infrastructure.
content: This project involved implementing a comprehensive power distribution system for a modern data center facility. The flexible busbar solution provided superior efficiency and reliability.
author: Yanghua STI Engineering Team
testimonial: Excellent solution that met all our requirements.

title: Industrial Manufacturing Upgrade
description: Power system modernization for large-scale manufacturing facility.
content: Comprehensive upgrade of power distribution infrastructure for a major manufacturing facility, improving efficiency and reducing downtime.
author: Yanghua STI Engineering Team
testimonial: Significant improvement in our power system reliability.

title: Renewable Energy Integration
description: Advanced power distribution for renewable energy facility.
content: Implementation of flexible busbar technology for a large-scale renewable energy facility, enabling efficient power distribution and grid integration.
author: Yanghua STI Engineering Team
testimonial: Outstanding performance in renewable energy applications.
